## ServerTransaction.receiveResponse() method

Receive outgoing responses to this request from the transaction user. Responses will be delivered to the transport as necessary.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract receiveResponse(statusCode: number, response: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statusCode | <code>number</code> | Response status code. |
|  response | <code>string</code> | Response. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
